verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) - [ARG0: Ethnic cleansing] [V: targeting] [ARG1: Rohingya Muslims] [ARGM-LOC: in Myanmar] has not stopped despite growing condemnation from the international community , the Trump administration said Tuesday .
